structure.unit: Regulations And By Laws Relative To Ways And Bridges

law.catch_line: Penalty For Violation Of Sec. 15 Or 16
law.text: Whoever violates any of the provisions of section fifteen or section sixteen shall be punished by a fine of not more than five dollars. The driver or custodian of a vehicle shall be deemed to be the party responsible therefor and shall be liable to the foregoing penalty.
